Kernel Variables
Kernel

Variables

 $modules = require_once BASE_DIR . 'modules.php'
 $feedback = array()
 $feedback_pre = array()
 $reload = FALSE
 $rendered = NULL

Detailed Description

The kernel variables are those variables needed by the "brain" of the app to load and run the modules

Variable Documentation

$feedback = array()

Data received from the BL

$feedback_pre = array()

Data received from pre-loading a module

$modules = require_once BASE_DIR . 'modules.php'

Main module structure loaded from modules.php

$reload = FALSE

A semaphor variable to check whether a module needs reloading or not

This variable is changed by a module

$rendered = NULL

Container for render()'s retval
